page.title: 15PLAYGROUND GAMES,LUCKINGTON.
page.content: Chain-tag, a group game.One child is the catcher.He counts to ten.The catcher chases the rest of the group, when he touches (tags)some-one,they hold hands and they chase the rest of the group one at a time.All the children that are caught join hands and form a chain.They tag the remaining children until everyone is caught. Cat and Mouse,a group game.A circle is drawn in chalk on the school playground.A group of children stand around the circumference of the circle.One child is chosen as the 'mouse',he's given a beanbag, he runs around the circle and drops the beanbag,behind a child and that child is then called the 'cat'.The cat chases the mouse, the mouse has to get into the cat's place before he's caught by the cat.
